item.description:
Go back in time to Robin Hood’s Springtime Festival

History Repeats Itself

http://www.robinhoodsfaire.com/

www.robinhoodsfaire.com/

This is opening day of the Faire.

Directions link Includes a diagram of the Fair Grounds.

http://www.guilfordfair.org/hours_directions.htm

www.guilfordfair.org/hours_directions.htm

Facebook:

http://www.facebook.com/ctfaire

www.facebook.com/ctfaire

Guilford Fair Grounds Lovers Lane Guilford,

CT 06437 (203) 453-3543

http://www.guilfordfair.org/

www.guilfordfair.org/

http://www.robinhoodsfaire.com/connecticut/ct_event_tickets.php

www.robinhoodsfaire.com/connecticut/ct_event_tickets.php

Meet by "Dave's Mini Donuts" Truck Closet to the

Entrance around 2:15.

Other Connecticut Faire later in October is;

Hebron Renaissance Fair

http://culturemob.com/events/5879808-connecticut-renaissance-faire-ct-hebron-hebron-ct-venue

culturemob.com/events/5879808-connecticut-renaissance-faire-ct-hebron-hebron-ct-venue

Renaissance Magazine http://www.renaissancemagazine.com/

www.renaissancemagazine.com/

"Weapons: must be secured and peace-tied."

Costumes are not needed to attend the Renaissance Faire.

You can wear a costume if you want to.

Comfortable clothes for walking around and your sense of humor

Are what is best to bring.

http://robinhoodsfaire.com/directions/#.UYWY2aLvtxA

robinhoodsfaire.com/directions/#.UYWY2aLvtxA

I will send reminder memos from time to time

Closer to the time of the event.

If you RSVP Yes and change your mind, then

You can RSVP No.

Otherwise RSVP No is not welcome.

Mike B.
item.how_to_find_us: I will contact those who RSVP Yes Closer to time of event.
item.name: Coffee Talk:Time Travel’s Guildford Renaissance Faire
